population: Kashiwabara, Maibara City, Shiga Prefecture (Tarui accent region)

k4_analysis.interpretation: Single dominant cluster reflecting linguistic homogeneity of Tarui-region population

linguistic_interpretation.finding: Unsupervised clustering reveals unimodal population structure with outliers
linguistic_interpretation.implication: Data-driven methods collapse intermediate accent categories without explicit prototype injection
linguistic_interpretation.validation: Cluster structure consistent with linguistic reality of Kashiwabara as Tarui accent zone

comparison_to_supervised.note: Supervised method with symbolic prototypes achieves finer discrimination than unsupervised clustering
